website_summaries.verdict: One of the best high-end overnight products. Contains idebenone, arguably the most powerful antioxidant.
pros: Minimizes the effects of sun damage and aging
Many users – well into their 60s and 70s – rave that they have almost no wrinkles after years of use
cons: Expensive, especially if you purchase the accompanying line of Elizabeth Arden daytime products

customer_reviews.title: Love these products and use every single one of them ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 73 and have been using Prevage products for over 15 years. I hear comments daily on how young I look. I recently renewed my drivers license and the person assisting me couldn't believe my age. Love these products and use every single one of them both for day and night usage.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brandt

customer_reviews.title: fountain of youth
customer_reviews.text: This whole product line is worth it. First and foremost it's made by Allergan (the makers of Botox) and Elizabeth Arden -- so there is science and beauty behind it. If it weren't so pricey I'd bathe in the stuff before bedtime. Love.
customer_reviews.author: ClassySassyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Elizabeth Arden's Prevage is possibly the best product on the market for reducing evidence of aging
customer_reviews.text: Elizabeth Arden's Prevage is possibly the best product on the market for reducing evidence of aging. I am over 60 and still have almost no wrinkles on my face. Combined with the Ceremide capsules on a daily basis the routine is an unbeatable solution to bearing up under the ravages of time.
customer_reviews.author: Gaynor Songer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, not sure if its any better than drugstore brands
customer_reviews.text: It was a fine moisturizer and seemed to keep my skin soft through the night. I used this in addition to the Prevage SPF30 for daytime. I have now completed both products. I can't say that it really did anything more than my regular nighttime moisturizers that I've purchased before. I think I'll probably return to using those, they are less expensive and work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: CHmom

customer_reviews.title: not worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product it's ok after applying it feels good but I don't see any change and the price is a bit high
customer_reviews.author: Zaira Rivadeneira,EC107Q61648N

customer_reviews.title: Used Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought prevage in december 2018. Only lasted 2 months, 6 months is duration for this product. It's obvious this was used before, very disappointed. I feel I am owed Aug refund!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: EA Really?
customer_reviews.text: Of concern to me is the absolute absence of the Elizabeth Arden name or trademark on any part of this product. I am wondering if it is a look alike. Better to spend a few more dollars and get the genuine item.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great Product- Not so well known but been around and proven for years!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product- Not so well known but been around and proven for years! Great Product- Not so well known but been around and proven for years!
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful!! My face looks ar least 39 years ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful!! My face looks ar least 39 years younger. (I am 85 but friends who are younger than me think they are ikder. I use this cream every night......I love it!!~!~
customer_reviews.author: Constance Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Great night product
customer_reviews.text: I use the daytime one for the day and this one at night and I love this product. Thank you for the great price and great delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M

customer_reviews.title: Great product- but the one I purchased smelled awful and must have expired
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if you are getting too good a deal on this product. Department store charges ~$120.00 and I paid only $70.00 for this product from one distributor on Amazon... but the product was inferior (smelled bad) and I suspect it was past its expiration (or poorly stored).
customer_reviews.author: Cara G. Yajnik

customer_reviews.title: Love that cream
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly skeptical when I started using it, but the results speak for themselves. My skin looks noticeably younger, fresher, more even. Love that cream. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love all Prevage products but they are too costly for me.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn j. walker

customer_reviews.title: Love it. A must have
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for about five years. Love it. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Jeraldine Lukianov

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few years. It is definitely worth the money . You will see a difference in your skin.
customer_reviews.author: janet gross

customer_reviews.title: The best night cream I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: The best night cream I have ever used. You only need to apply a little at night. Next day the skin is soft.I am seventy seventy and I look much younger. No wrinkles with dewy soft skin thanks to this night cream and the other prevage products. Worth every penny. Evangeline
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forever young
customer_reviews.text: I've used for 2 years, this product is the best anti aging treatment . I'm 42 and look like 30 years old. I recommend Prevage.
customer_reviews.author: Josi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My face looks so much better using this daily. Wrinkles gone. LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fasciano

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of Prevage from Sephora. I put it on at night and by morning I had pretty painful and unsightly burning all over my face. Granted, it does suggest to do a patch test before using, but as I have used a wide variety of products on my face and have never been at all sensitive, I did ignore this suggestion. I would just suggest that before buying this product to try a sample and definetely patch test first!
customer_reviews.author: Meditating Mama

product_meta.title: Elizabeth Arden Prevage Anti-Aging Overnight Cream
product_meta.description:
An intensely hydrating overnight cream. Developed with advanced Idebenone technology to work during the night. Combats the visible effects of environmental damage from the day. Maximizes skin's natural hydration and repair capabilities. Visibly reduces the appearance of lines, wrinkles, discolorations and the effects of sun damage. Reveals a softer, smoother, brighter, more even-toned and younger looking complexion.

BRAND STORY
Scientific skincare. Enhancing color. Timeless fragrance. From New York to the world, Elizabeth Arden empowers all women to be ready to make their mark today.
